At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I turn right at the building.  
B. I go to the chair between the buildings.  
C. I turn right toward the tree.  
D. I fly over buildings.  
E. I rise to a high altitude.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The initial instruction is to "take off and move forward towards the pond," which implies an elevation in altitude. The subsequent frames show a high-altitude view of the cityscape, indicating that the agent has risen significantly above the ground level, aligning with the action of rising to a high altitude.
